summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. W-8, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from California Avenue to Grant Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle (formerly West Seattle), by grading and parking the same and by constructing cement sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No.176 of the former City of West Seattle and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
